article.title: Enter to Win Free Registration to AFCEA TechNet Augusta 2016
article.abstract: Interested in attending AFCEA TechNet Augusta 2016, being held August 2-4 in Augusta, GA? Enter our quick giveaway for a chance to win free registration!
article.text:
Interested in attending AFCEA TechNet Augusta 2016, being held August 2-4 in Augusta, GA? Enter our quick giveaway below for a chance to win free registration!
Don't miss this opportunity to hear from cybersecurity thought leaders; network; explore the latest innovations on the exhibit floor; and gain credits to maintain certifications at one of 30 sessions approved for continuing education.
a Rafflecopter giveaway
